column12: ++Response{s}++|| by {teachers}||{colon}{"." if not text and teachers else " " + text}
column16: An excerpt of any category which has a response annotation will be found when searching for questions.

column12: ++Teaching{s}++|| by {teachers}||{colon}{"." if not text else " " + text}
++Reflection{s}++|| by {teachers}||{colon}{"." if not text else " " + text}
++Dhamma talk{s}++|| offered by {teachers}||{colon}{"." if not text else " " + text}

column16: A quote from the teacher him/herself.

column13: ++Quote:++ {prefix} “{text}”{' — ' if suffix else ''}{suffix}||{'.' if suffix else ''} Quoted by {teachers}.
column16: The teacher quoting someone else. If the person quoted is a teacher, they should get the first tag.

{teachers} should be the author(s) of the book. Use a Read by annotation to indicate who does the reading. If the book appears in the list of references, {teachers} will be set and " by {teachers}" inserted automatically. If not, plug both in manually along with the hyperlink if relevant.

column12: ++Comment{s}++|| by {teachers}||{colon}{"." if not text else " " + text}
++Discussion{s}++|| led by {teachers}||{colon}{"." if not text else " " + text}

column16: Used for session excerpts; can be blank. If the session excerpt has a list of items (e. g. readings), the items should be annotations to a summary excerpt.

column12: {'Read by ' if text else ''}{text}{'.' if text else ''}||{'' if text else 'Read by ' + teachers + '.'}
column16: If the reader is not a teacher, {teachers} should be empty and {text} specifies the name of the reader.

column12: {'Translated by ' if text else ''}{text}{'.' if text else ''}||{'' if text else 'Translated by ' + teachers + '.'}
{'Asked by ' if text else ''}{text}{'.' if text else ''}||{'' if text else 'Asked by ' + teachers + '.'}

column16: A fragment annotation indicates that the next annotation and its sub-annotations should be duplicated in a separate except following the main excerpt. The Fragment annotation itself is rendered as an audio player to play that excerpt.
